com.sizzo.something.data
类 SizzoDatabaseHelper

java.lang.Object
  android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      com.sizzo.something.data.SizzoDatabaseHelper

public class SizzoDatabaseHelper
extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper

Database helper for contacts. Designed as a singleton to make sure that all ContentProvider users get the same reference. Provides handy methods for maintaining package and mime-type lookup tables.

dbForProfile

protected int dbForProfile()
Returns the value to be returned when querying the column indicating that the contact or raw contact belongs to the user's personal profile. Overridden in the profile DB helper subclass.
